name: Snowboard
description:
Go snowboarding and earn points.

Using the keys on the keyboard and mouse, choose one of the two characters.
Then select a card.
Controlling the character, jump over the obstacles and get points for doing tricks.

The game has a choice of characters, you can choose one of two characters.
The game also has 2 maps for rolling.

You can go around obstacles, drive into special objects and jump from them, getting points for this, score as many points as possible.
